text: Hagi mago ran kuma'ma Israeli vahe'mo'zama Aroni naga'ma zami'nazana, Juda nagamokizmi mopamofo agona asoparega me'nea kuma Kiriat-Arbane (mago agia Hebronie) ana kuma'mofoma trazamo'a masavenke hukagi'nea mopa tra'zama nenaza afuzamima antesagu zami'naze. (Hagi Arba'a Anaki naga'mokizmi nezamageho'e.)
